## ğŸ“Description

PG Finder is a mobile application that helps users search and find paying guest (PG) accommodations. It allows users to browse through a list of PG options based on their preferred location, amenities, budget, etc. The app also provides detailed information about each PG such as photos, pricing, contact details, etc. Users can also filter the search results to find the most suitable PG for their needs. The app also provides a platform for PG owners to list their properties and reach out to potential tenants. With PG Finder, finding a convenient and affordable PG accommodation has never been easier.

    1.Convenient and Easy to Use: The app allows users to search for PG accommodations from their smartphone or tablet, saving time and effort compared to traditional methods of finding a PG.

    2.Wide Range of Options: The app provides a large database of PG options, allowing users to choose from a variety of options based on their preferences and budget.

    3.Detailed Information: The app provides detailed information about each PG, including photos, pricing, amenities, and contact details, making it easier for users to make an informed decision.

    4.Customizable Search Filters: Users can apply filters to the search results to find the most suitable PG option, making it easier to find the right accommodation.

    5.Real-time Availability: The app provides real-time information about the availability of each PG, ensuring that users can find an available option quickly and easily.

    6.Direct Communication: The app provides a platform for direct communication between users and PG owners, allowing for seamless and efficient communication.

## ğŸ“ˆProgress

List down all the fully implemented features in your project

- Detailed Property Information: The app provides detailed information about each PG, including photos, pricing, amenities, and contact details.
- PG Availability: The app provides information about the availability of each PG, allowing users to see which options are currently available.
- Reviews or comment: Users can leave reviews and comments for each PG, allowing others to see the experiences of previous tenants.
- Direct Communication: The app provides a platform for direct communication between users and PG owners, allowing for seamless and efficient communication.
- Listing Management: PG owners can create a profile and list their properties on the app.


List down all the partially implemented features in your project

- Search and Filtering: Users can search for PG accommodations based on location, amenities, budget, etc. and apply filters to the search results to find the most suitable option.
- Payment Processing: The app can include a payment processing system, allowing users to securely pay for their PG accommodation directly through the app.
- In-app Booking: Users can book a PG directly through the app, making it easy and convenient to secure a PG accommodation.

## ğŸ”®Future Scope

List down all the future plans for the project here

- Push Notifications: The app can send push notifications to users to keep them updated on new listings, bookings, and other important updates.
- User Account Management: Users can manage their bookings, payments, and other information from a single, secure account.
- Virtual Tours: The app can provide virtual tours of PG accommodations, allowing users to preview properties before booking.
- AI-powered Matching: The app can use AI algorithms to match tenants with the most suitable PG accommodations based on their preferences and past behavior.
- Automated Rent Collection: The app can include an automated rent collection system, allowing PG owners to easily manage their rental income and expenses.
- Multilingual Support: The app can support multiple languages, making it accessible to a wider range of users.
- Analytics and Insights: The app can provide real-time analytics and insights into rental market trends, helping PG owners make informed business decisions.

## ğŸ’¸Applications


    1. Accommodation Search: PG Finder allows users to easily search for paying guest (PG) accommodations based on their preferred location, budget, and other criteria, making it easier to find a suitable place to stay.

    2. Rental Management: PG owners can list their properties on the app and manage their listings, including receiving inquiries and booking requests from potential tenants.

    3. Tenant Matching: The app can match tenants with suitable PG accommodations based on their preferences and budget, reducing the time and effort required to find a place to stay.

    4. Real-time Availability: The app provides real-time information about the availability of each PG, allowing users to see which options are currently available.

    5. Direct Communication: The app provides a platform for direct communication between users and PG owners, making it easier to coordinate and finalize rental arrangements.

    6. User Feedback: The app allows users to leave reviews and ratings for each PG, providing valuable feedback to PG owners and helping others make informed decisions.

    7. There is no involvement of Broker while contacting pg owner. 


## ğŸ› Project Setup

>Include your project setup basics here. Steps for how someone else can setup your project on their machine. Add any relevant details as well.
 
1. Download the app: New users can download the app from the App Store or Google Play Store, depending on their device.

2. Create an account: New users can create a new account by entering their name, email address, and password.

3. Complete profile: New users can complete their profile by adding additional information such as their location, budget, and preferred location.

## ğŸ’»Usage

>Steps to run your project once its setup. If you have an app or website, list how the user can go about using it.

1. Search for PGs: Users can search for PG accommodations based on their preferences, including location, budget, and amenities.

2. Browse Listings: Users can browse through the available PG listings, view photos, and read descriptions to find the best match.

3. Contact Owners: Users can contact PG owners directly through the app to ask questions and schedule a visit.
